text: Tony: What's he been doing?
Thor: Absolutely nothing.
Steve: Where are the stones?
Tony: Somewhere under all this.
Tony: All I know is he doesn't have 'em.
Steve: So, we keep it that way.
Thor: You know it's a trap, right?
Tony: Yeah. I don't much care.
Thor: Good.
Thor: Just as long as we're all in agreement.
Thor: Let's kill him properly this time.
Thanos: You could not live with your own failure.
Thanos: What did that bring you?
Thanos: Back to me.
Thanos: I thought by eliminating half of life... the other half would thrive.
Thanos: But you've shown me...
Thanos: that's impossible.
Thanos: And as long as there are those that remember what was...
Thanos: there will always be those that are unable to
Thanos: accept what can be.
Thanos: They will resist.
Tony: Yep, we're all kinds of stubborn.
Thanos: I'm thankful.
Thanos: Because now I know what I must do.
Thanos: I will shred this universe down to its last atom.
Thanos: And then...
Thanos: with the stones you've collected for me...
Thanos: create a new one...
Thanos: teeming with life... that knows not what it is lost but only what it has been given.
Thanos: A grateful universe.
Steve: Born out of blood.
Thanos: They'll never know it
Thanos: Because you won't be alive to tell them.
